rationale: 'significantly higher' modifies 'prices', an economic metric, not a risk-adjective.
statement_text: In 2022, nearly 58 million birds—mostly chicken and turkeys—were slaughtered to deal with the virus, contributing significantly higher egg and turkey prices.
In 2022, nearly 58 million birds—mostly chicken and turkeys—were slaughtered to deal with the virus, contributing significantly higher egg and turkey prices.
